item.title: The CLion 2024.2 Early Access Program Is Open
item.description: We recently shared our plans and directions for v2024.2. In this roadmap, our team identified the following key objectives for the 2024.2 version of CLion: Today, we are happy to announce that we’ve taken the first step on this journey by launching the CLion 2024.2 Early Access Program (EAP)! This program enables the community to […] Link to article: https://blog.jetbrains.com/clion/2024/05/clion-2024-2-eap-open/

item.title: Learn Unity and Godot Game Development with JetBrains
item.description: Over the last several years, we’ve worked hard, making the best game development tools available to creators worldwide. Large AAA studios to indie game darlings have loved writing their C# and C++ code using JetBrains Rider. Honestly, it looks like a blast! What better time to be making video games than right now? In the […] Link to article: https://blog.jetbrains.com/dotnet/2024/05/27/learn-unity-and-godot-game-development-with-jetbrains/

item.title: The Future of Space
item.description: When we set out to create Space, we envisioned a system that would provide an all-in-one solution for IT companies. It was intended to be a tool that would not only provide everything your company needs for software development, including projects, Git hosting, code reviews, and issue tracking, but also enable communication and information sharing […] Link to article: https://blog.jetbrains.com/space/2024/05/27/the-future-of-space/
